TopicTitle: Orion MPCV with SLS Block I (UPDATED)

Articles.Content:
After some hard work, I present you:

Orion Multi-Purpose Crew Vehicle

Javascript is disabled. View full album

My first 'proper' video of its capabilities(old):

What it can do:

  • Deliver Kerbals to LKO, LMO and LMINO
  • Return Kerbals back to Kerbin(obviously)
  • Dock to spacecraft and Space Stations

LKO-Low Kerbin Orbit

LMO-Low Mun Orbit

LMINO-Low Minmus Orbit

What it consists of:

*image is property of NASA

Action Groups(included in craft description)

1-Toggle solar panels

8-Deploy chutes(use after Abort)

9-Detach LES

Abort-Decouples the pod and fires the LES engines, launching the crew to safety

LES- Launch Escape System

V2 RELEASED!

What's new:

Rearranged RCS thruster more realistically
Removed ugly decoupler, replaced with new unlatch mechanism
Fairings between transfer stage and Orion separate much easier now, thanks to low-power separatrons
Added long-range antenna
Turned the whole thing 45 degrees, now to perform gravity turn just pitch down!
Overall improvements

Download

Btw they offer long distance tutoring too, I can give the website if you're interested.
